questions: eik achi shairi ki kya nishani ha
answers:
Shayari ki achi shairi ki kuch nishaniyan hain:
Meaningful: Achi shairi ka matlab hona zaroori hai. Shairi mein koi baat ho, koi message ho, koi ehsaas ho, koi khayal ho, ya koi haqeeqat ho.
Rhythm: Shairi mein aik musalsal rhythm hona zaroori hai. Har misra aik doosre se milta julta ho aur shairi ko aik flow mein le jaata ho.
Rhyme: Shairi mein aik aisa pattern hona zaroori hai jis mein har misra aik doosre se milta julta ho aur aik aisa sound create karta ho jo sunne walon ko khushbu ki tarah mehsoos ho.
Imagery: Achi shairi mein aik aisa tasawwur hona zaroori hai jo sunne walon ke zehn mein tasveer banaye. Shairi mein aik aisa nazara hona chahiye jo sunne walon ke dil ko chhoo jaye.
Emotion: Shairi mein aik aisa ehsaas hona zaroori hai jo sunne walon ke dil ko chhoo jaye. Shairi mein aik aisa jazba hona chahiye jo sunne walon ko mehsoos ho aur unke dil ko jeet le.
In sab nishaniyon ke saath, achi shairi kaafi powerful hoti hai aur sunne walon ke dil ko chhoo jati hai.

questions: school kbacho keh lea kyu zaroori huta ha?
answers:
School bachon ke liye zaroori hai kyun keh yeh unke liye ek aisi jagah hai jahan woh naye cheezon ko seekhte hain aur apne knowledge ko enhance karte hain. School mein bachon ko basic education di jati hai jaise keh reading, writing, aur arithmetic. Iske saath saath, school mein bachon ko social skills aur teamwork bhi sikhaye jate hain. School mein bachon ko discipline aur time management bhi sikhaya jata hai jo unke future ke liye bahut zaroori hai. School mein bachon ko teachers aur peers se interact karne ka mauka bhi milta hai jo unke communication skills ko improve karta hai. Isi tarah, school bachon ke liye ek bahut zaroori institution hai jahan woh apne aane wale career ke liye tayyari karte hain

.

questions: gazlo ki kya nishani ha
answers:
Ghazal ki kuch nishaniyan hain:
Matla: Ghazal ka pehla sher matla kehlata hai. Matla mein ghazal ke maqsad aur mazmoon ka izhaar hota hai.
Beher: Ghazal mein har sher ka beher ek jaisa hota hai. Beher ka matlab hai ke har sher mein ek musalsal rhythm hota hai.
Radif: Ghazal mein har doosre sher mein aik aisa word ya phrase hota hai jo pehle sher ke akhir mein hota hai. Isko radif kehte hain.
Kaafiya: Ghazal mein har doosre sher mein aik aisa word hota hai jo pehle sher ke akhir ke se milta julta hota hai. Isko kaafiya kehte hain.
Mazmoon: Ghazal mein koi aik mazmoon hota hai jis ke hawale se ghazal likhi jati hai. Mazmoon ghazal ke har sher mein zahir hota hai.
In sab nishaniyon ke saath, ghazal ek bahut khoobsurat shayari ka andaz hai jo sunne walon ke dil ko chhoo jati hai.

questions: kya ap stock market ki paish gaohi ker sakte hain?
answers: Haan, main stock market ke baare mein aapko kuch jankari de sakti hoon. Stock market ek aisa market hai jahan par companies apne shares ko public ke through bechti hain aur log usmein invest karte hain. Stock market mein shares ki keemat market demand aur supply ke hisaab se tay hoti hai aur ismein companies ke performance, economic indicators, aur global events ka bhi bahut bada role hota hai. Stock market mein investment karne se pehle investors ko companies ki financial performance, future growth prospects, aur market trends ke baare mein acchi tarah se research karna chahiye. Stock market mein investment karne ke liye investors ko ek demat account khulwana hota hai aur iske liye SEBI (Securities and Exchange Board of India) ke rules aur regulations ko follow karna hota hai. Stock market mein investment karne se pehle investors ko apne risk appetite aur financial goals ko acchi tarah se samajhna chahiye.

questions: ap zindagi keh maqsaad ko kese byan kere gain?
answers: Zindagi ke maqsad ko bayan karna kisi bhi shayar ya lekhak ke liye bahut hi mushkil kaam hai. Yeh har insaan ke liye alag ho sakta hai aur iska jawab bhi alag-alag ho sakta hai. Kuch logon ke liye zindagi ka maqsad khud ko khush rakhna hota hai, toh kuch logon ke liye yeh dusron ki madad karna hota hai. Kuch logon ke liye zindagi ka maqsad apne sapno ko pura karna hota hai, toh kuch logon ke liye yeh apne parivar aur doston ke saath samay bitana hota hai. Zindagi ka maqsad har insaan ke liye alag ho sakta hai aur iske baare mein sochne ke liye humein apne andar ke ehsaas aur jazbaat ko samajhna zaroori hai.

questions: ap ache bure ka farak kese bata sakte hu?
answers: Ache aur bure ke farak ko samajhne ke liye humein apne andar ke ehsaas aur jazbaat ko samajhna zaroori hai. Yeh farak kisi bhi cheez ke liye ho sakta hai, jaise ki insaan, kaam, ya samay. Kisi bhi kaam ko karne se pehle humein uske fayde aur nuksaan ko samajhna chahiye aur phir uske baad hi uska faisla lena chahiye. Iske alawa, humein dusron ke saath bhi acche se vyavhaar karna chahiye aur unki madad karne ki koshish karni chahiye.

questions: ap shaur ki tarif kaise karen gey?
answers:

Shaur insaan ke andar ke jazbaat aur ehsaas ko bayan karta hai.
Shaur ke zariye hum apne sapno ko pura kar sakte hain aur apne aap ko khush rakh sakte hain.
Shaur ek aisa ehsaas hai jo ki humein zindagi ke har mod par himmat aur hausla deta hai.
Shaur ke zariye hum apne kaam mein accha performance kar sakte hain aur apne aap ko aur bhi behtar bana sakte hain.
Is tarah se shaur ke khoobsurat ehsaas ko tarif kiya jaa sakta hai.

questions: insan kyon wajud rakhte hain
answers: Insan ko wajud rakha jata hai kyun keh woh ek aisa makhlooq hai jo keh apne andar ke jazbaat, ehsaas, aur soch ko bayan kar sakta hai. Insan ko Allah ne is duniya mein bheja hai taaki woh apne aap ko aur duniya ko behtar bana sake. Insan ko wajud rakha jata hai taaki woh apne sapno ko pura kar sake, apne aap ko aur dusron ko khush rakh sake, aur is duniya ko ek behtar jagah bana sake. Insan ke andar ke jazbaat aur ehsaas uski khud ki pehchaan ko banate hain aur uske kaam aur vyavhaar ko prabhavit karte hain. Isliye, insan ko wajud rakha jata hai taaki woh apne andar ke ehsaas ko bayan kar sake aur is duniya mein apni pehchaan bana sake.

questions: ap kia kaheen gay kah insaniyat ko darpish sab se bada masila kia he
answers: Insaniyat ke liye darpesh sab se bada masla yeh hai keh humein apne aap ko aur dusron ko samajhna zaroori hai. Hum apne aap ko samajhne ke liye apne andar ke jazbaat aur ehsaas ko samajhna chahiye aur dusron ko samajhne ke liye unki madad karni chahiye. Iske alawa, humein apne kaam aur vyavhaar ko bhi acchi tarah se sochna chahiye aur dusron ke saath acche se vyavhaar karna chahiye. Insaniyat ke liye darpesh masle mein aur bhi bahut se masle shamil hain, jaise ki gareebi, berozgari, aur bhed-bhav. Lekin, agar hum apne aap ko aur dusron ko samajhne mein safal ho jaate hain toh hum in maslon ka samadhan bhi nikal sakte hain aur insaniyat ko ek behtar jagah bana sakte hain.

questions: kya ap kachrey ko recycle kerne ka naya tariqa ijaad ker sakte hain
answers:
Ji haan, main kachre ko recycle karne ke liye eik naya tariqa tayyar kar sakti hoon. Kuchh ideas neeche diye gaye hain:
Kachre ko alag-alag categories mein sort karein jaise ki plastic, glass, metal, aur paper.
Kachre ko recycle karne ke liye designated recycle bins ka istemal karein.
Kachre ko reuse karein aur uska upyog karein jaise ki old newspapers ko packing material ke liye use karna.
Kachre ko donate karein aur usko kisi aur ke liye useful banayein.
Kachre ko compost karein aur usse fertilizer tayar karein.
In ideas ko follow karke hum apne kachre ko recycle kar sakte hain aur environment ko protect kar sakte hain.

In tariqon ko follow karke hum cyber crime ko rok sakte hain aur apni personal information ko secure bana sakte hain.
